---@class BattleRenderWorld
local BattleRenderWorld = SimpleClassUtil:class()

function BattleRenderWorld:initialize()
   self._contextManager = BattleRenderContext:new()
end

function BattleRenderWorld:init(blackBoard,battleData,battleManager)
   self._contextManager:init(blackBoard,battleData,battleManager)
end

function BattleRenderWorld:update(dt)
   if self._contextManager then
      self._contextManager:update(dt)
   end
end

return BattleRenderWorld
